While protesters dismissed the Cabinet reshuffle as cosmetic and demanded Hosni Mubarak 's immediate ouster, Zahi Hawass said Egyptians should give his boss more time. The people in the streets have to give this government an opportunity to change, he said cheerfully. "Beautiful things happened in the last five days."
